page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content: THE RELIGIOUS NEEDS OF THE PARISHIONERS ARE MET BY THREE PLACES OF WORSHIP. THE BAPTIST CHAPEL (MR.P.STEWARD) IS SITUATED ON THE HIGH ST., THE METHODIST CHURCH (MR.A.W.GURRY) IS ON PARKHALL RD. AND THE PARISH CHURCH OF ST.JOHN THE BAPTIST (REV.A.P.LUDLOW) TOWERS OVER THE VILLAGE FROM ITS POSITION NEAR THE HEART OF SOMERSHAM ON CHURCH ST. THE (13TH PARISH CHURCH IN THE ELY DIOCESE IS NOW THE MOTHER CHURCH TO THE PARISH CHURCHES OF PIDLEY AND COLNE AND THE RECTOR HOLDS SERVICES IN THESE THREE CHURCHES. THE CUBS, BROWNIES, SCOUTS AND GUIDES MAINTAIN LINKS WITH THE CHURCH AS WELL AS THE RECENTLY FORMED BOYS BRIGADE. A YOUNG CHURCH (SUNDAY SCHOOL) MEETS EACH SUNDAY AND JOINS IN THE SECOND HALF OF THE EUCHARIST HELD AT THE PARISH CHURCH.
